name: TRAIN - xkcd game jam
description:
Description:

A short game made in about 10 hours for xkcd game jam in November 2017.

You jump'n'run on the roof of a train, which moves (through?) the world in a game about reference frames (and trains). Collect the coins and avoid the 8-balls, while you pass landmarks on your way. Or stop the course of the world by stopping the train...

The game jam: itch.io/jam/xkcdgamejam

The Comic: xkcd.com/1366/ and explainxkcd.com/wiki/index.php/1366:_Train

This is a game jam result, so some Things are rough and unfinished by full awareness.  And it has no sound. Maybe I'll further work on this.

Tribute to Randall Munroe's work.
